mixed-citation.article-title: Hydroids (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa) from the Vema and Valdivia seamounts (SE Atlantic)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Leuckartiara octona
– Millard 1975: 123–125, fig. 41a–d. —
Schuchert 2012: 251–252
, fig. 232.

Circumglobal in subtropical and temperate waters. In the eastern Atlantic, it has been reported from the Arctic Seas ( Kramp 1938 ) to South Africa (Millard 1975). Its bathymetric range extends from the intertidal (Millard 1975) to depths of 418 m ( Gil & Ramil 2017 ) and 451 m (this paper).
